00028                                                  QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent),

00041 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 // Function: undo()
00043 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 void SystemColumnMoveCommand::undo()
00045 {
00046     column_->setPos(oldPos_);
00047     layout_->onMoveColumn(column_);
00048     layout_->onReleaseColumn(column_);
00049 
00050     // Execute child commands.
00051     QUndoCommand::undo();
00052 }
00053 
00054 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // Function: redo()
00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 void SystemColumnMoveCommand::redo()
00058 {
00059     column_->setPos(newPos_);
00060     layout_->onMoveColumn(column_);
00061     layout_->onReleaseColumn(column_);
00062 
00063     // Execute child commands.
00064     QUndoCommand::redo();
00065 }

00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 // Function: undo()
00120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 void MappingCompMoveCommand::undo()
00122 {
00123     SystemColumn* oldColumn = static_cast<SystemColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00124 
00125     item_->setPos(oldColumn->mapFromScene(oldPos_));
00126     oldColumn->onMoveItem(item_, oldColumn);
00127 
00128     SystemColumn* newColumn = static_cast<SystemColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00129     newColumn->onReleaseItem(item_);
00130 
00131     // Execute child commands.
00132     QUndoCommand::undo();
00133 }
00134 
00135 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 // Function: redo()
00137 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void MappingCompMoveCommand::redo()
00139 {
00140     SystemColumn* oldColumn = static_cast<SystemColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00141 
00142     item_->setPos(oldColumn->mapFromScene(newPos_));
00143     oldColumn->onMoveItem(item_, oldColumn);
00144 
00145     SystemColumn* newColumn = static_cast<SystemColumn*>(item_->parentItem());
00146     newColumn->onReleaseItem(item_);
00147 
00148     // Execute child commands.
00149     QUndoCommand::redo();
00150 }
